mapper.insert: insert into comicschange.authors (NAME, SURNAME, PATRONYMIC) values (#{author.name},#{author.surname},#{author.patronymic})
mapper.delete: UPDATE comicschange.authors SET DELETED = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from comicschange.authors where name = #{author.name} and surname = #{author.surname} and patronymic = #{author.patronymic} AND DELETED = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE comicschange.authors SET NAME = #{author.name}, SURNAME = #{author.surname}, PATRONYMIC = #{author.patronymic} WHERE ID = #{author.id} AND DELETED = 0
mapper.select: select * from comicschange.authors where id = #{id} AND DELETED = 0
